records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King

records.quote: Use what you’ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
records.author: Yvonne Pierre

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: The Romanticists did not present a hero as a statistical average, but as an abstraction of man’s best and highest potentiality, applicable to and achievable by all men, in various degrees, according to their individual choices.
records.author: Ayn Rand
